titleStmt.title: Charles Gahres and Martha J. Gahres v. Isabella Sutton and W. H. Barrett. Memo from the Clerk

publicationStmt.authority: Bring Me the Body: A Digital & Print History of Marginalized Habeas Corpus Petitioners in the North American West, 1804-1912

bibl.title: Charles Gahres and Martha J. Gahres v. Isabella Sutton and W. H. Barrett. Memo from the Clerk
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Walla Walla County Government; Clerk, Territorial Court Civil/Criminal Case Files, 1860-1889

div1.p: RP Reynolds Clerk of the District Court of the first Jud Dist of Washington Territory in and for said County thereby certify that the foregoing is a correct of copy of the order of the Judge of said court concerning the custody of said child in said forgoing entitled action.
In witness whereof I have hereto set my hand and affixed the deal of said court this 1st day of July 1871

I hereby certify that I have served the notice & duly delivering to each of the Plts a true and certified copy of the same certified to by me to be such in the county of Walla Walla on the 1st day of July 1871

J. McAuliff Sheriff
Walla Walla County
